definition: cultivated land/in Chinese medicine, preparation from rhizome of Chinese foxglove (Rehmannia glutinosa)
cooked (of food)/ripe (of fruit)/mature (of seeds)/familiar/skilled/done/also pr. [shou2]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]

sentences.english: The smith forged the plow with great skill.
sentences.chinese: 那鐵匠技術嫺熟地鍛造馬的蹄鐵。

sentences.english: They provide good service and skillfully brew tea for tea customers.
sentences.chinese: 茶博士爲顧客提供良好的服務，嫺熟地沏茶。

sentences.english: Why should the company provide the good service?
sentences.chinese: 茶博士爲顧客提供良好的服務，嫺熟地沏茶。

sentences.english: Is everything coming to fruition or to wither without anything?
sentences.chinese: 到底是瓜熟地落還是枯黃凋落？

sentences.english: She is sending text messages with unerring skill, the keys are being tapped.
sentences.chinese: 她嫺熟地發着短信，把手機按鍵按得不住地咔嗒響。

sentences.english: With great skill, John piloted the boat into the little harbour .
sentences.chinese: 約翰很嫺熟地將船引進了那個小港灣。

sentences.english: Our two guards defended with great skill.
sentences.chinese: 我隊的兩名後衛技巧嫺熟地防守。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The methods can be used for the quality control of Radix Rehmanniae Praeparata.
sentences.chinese: 結論本方法可用於熟地黃藥材的質量控制。

definition: Angelica sinensis
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
dodder (Cuscuta sinensis, a parasitic vine with seeds used in medicine)
chuanxiong rhizome
red nut sedge (Cyperus rotundus)
practiced/proficient/skilled/skillful
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
cinnamon (Ramulus Cinnamomi)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
adept/skilled
Chinese foxglove (Rehmannia glutinosa), its rhizome used in TCM
eucommia (a kind of rubber tree)
Wolfiporia extensa (a wood-decay fungus)/fu ling/tuckahoe
Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
peach kernel, used in Chinese medicine
